price: And We admitted them to Our mercy, for they were truly righteous.
arabic: وَأَدۡخَلۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي رَحۡمَتِنَآۖ إِنَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
